item.title: Scripting tricks and tips
item.description: References NEXT NEXT - READ COREUTILS 1. [ ] http://mywiki.kooledge.org/BashPitfalls 2. [ ] http://mywiki.wooledge.org/BashGuide 3. [ ] http://www.sobell.com/CR3/index.html 4. [ ] http://cli.learncodethehardway.org/book/ 5. [ ] https://google.github.io/styleguide/shell.xml GO How to rewrite shell scripts in go https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gKP1r4T0xVg Bash tips how to break out of read with escape linux - Create interrupt in bash by keys like ENTER Or ESC - Stack Overflow Following works ^M for ENTER and ^[ for ESC but may stty intr ^M stty intr ^[ but after cannot use ENTER to restore default stty intr ^C for ternary if else { command } is how you group it
